page.title: 14LIVING IN BALLYUTOAG
page.content: Jacqueline attends Loanends Youth Club which meets weekly (fortnightly in the summer). Here she plays games such as snooker, pool and hockey and has taken part in "Superteams", a competition between a number of Youth clubs. Jacqueline does not have other children living near her home to play with. When at home, she helps around the house or watches TV as well as doing her school work. With this added to her other leisure activities, she clearly lives a busy and varied life in the countryside.
